text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Baba was born in Tokyo Metropolis on May 4, 1977. She played for Nippon TV Beleza from 1994 to 2006. On August 3, 2001, Baba debuted for the Japan national team against South Korea. She played 5 games for Japan between 2001 and 2002. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 2001 4 0 2002 1 0 Total 5 0 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Tokyo Prefecture Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Nippon TV Tokyo Verdy Beleza players
title: Noriko Baba
